description: A beautiful little Mexican paradise north of Yucatan Peninsula with a lagoon full of pelicans and flamingos.
This largest alpine lake in North America, is perhaps the most photographed SUP location in the world. Conditions are great from late spring until early fall.
An archipelago of 40 coral islands surrounded by turquoise waters, the Turks and Caicos Islands are a paddleboarding haven.
The place where SUP was born. Hawaii has everything a paddle boarder could ever want. Look out for sea turtles and whales.
Glide on the pristine waters of Boracay and enjoy the natural beauty around. Perfect for beginners.
